channel.title: BattleScape Client Background
channel.description:
Hey guys. IK I sound really nooby right now, but I need help with changing the background.
It's a BattleScape client. I downloaded the Image_Packer and put it in the client. I changed the background, then compiled within the image packer. Then I clicked Pack.bat and it worked (supposedly). Then I compiled my client, clicked run.bat, then it loaded. It was still loading the same background image :(
Did I do something wrong, or am I missing something? Help is needed!

item.title: BattleScape Client Background
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Just go under the sprites, most of the time its under files then you see something called sprites, click on it and look for the background.

Read full topic
